Banner Ad Activity ReCreate Banner AD Banner ads are rectangular images that occupy a spot at the top, middle, or bottom within an apps layout. Banner ads refresh automatically at regular intervals. When a user taps a banner ad, the user is redirected to the advertisers page in most cases Your video content SkipAd Ad Flag Learn more Load Ad Play InStreamAd Mute Pause ReCreate InStream AD Video Native Ad example Small Native Ad example Large Image Native Ad example Score : Play For Point Watch video for Reward icon Back InStreamRoll Ad Activity HUAWEI Ads Publisher Service utilizes Huawei\'s vast user base and extensive data capabilities to deliver targeted, high quality ad content to users. With this service, your app will be able to generate revenues while bringing your users content which is relevant to them. Rewarded ads are full-screen video ads that reward users for watching. Interstitial ads are full-screen ads that cover the interface of an app. Such ads are displayed when a user starts, pauses, or exits an app, without disrupting the user\'s experience. Interstitial Ads Service Introduction Banner Ad https://developer.huawei.com/consumer/en/doc/development/HMSCore-Guides/publisher-service-introduction-0000001070671805 The express splash ad service is a new traffic monetization solution provided by HUAWEI Ads to improve splash ad experience without requiring you to integrate any SDK. Prerequisites.An app integrated with this service can display express splash ads only after a user agrees to the user agreement.When the user agreement status changes (a user agrees to or withdraws from the agreement), the latest status needs to be synchronized to HUAWEI Ads.
